original_text: And Micaiah said, “Therefore hear the word of the Lord: I saw the Lord sitting on his throne, and all the host of heaven standing beside him on his right hand and on his left;
korean_text: 미가야가 이르되 그런즉 왕은 여호와의 말씀을 들으소서 내가 보니 여호와께서 그의 보좌에 앉으셨고 하늘의 만군이 그의 좌우편에 모시고 서 있는데

sentences.original_text: Therefore hear the word of the Lord:
I saw the Lord sitting on his throne,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 보니 여호와께서 그 보좌에 앉으셨고,

sentences.original_text: and all the host of heaven
on his right hand and on his left;
